languages.text: Пользуясь кризисом в Просторе, влиятельный консорциум шахтеров срывает поставки руды в колонии протектората.
In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.
languages.original_text: Пользуясь кризисом в Просторе, влиятельный консорциум шахтеров срывает поставки руды в колонии протектората.

traits.locale_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.
A Chartist trading partner cannot pay their dues on time. The colony hopes for your intervention.

languages.text: Cherchant à exploiter la crise qui frappe les Étendues, un important consortium minier perturbe les livraisons de minerai à destination des colonies du protectorat.
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Cherchant à exploiter la crise qui frappe les Étendues, un important consortium minier perturbe les livraisons de minerai à destination des colonies du protectorat.

languages.text: エクスパンスの危機を利用しようと、著名な採掘連合体が保護領のコロニーへの鉱石輸送を妨害している。
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスの危機を利用しようと、著名な採掘連合体が保護領のコロニーへの鉱石輸送を妨害している。

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区危机期间，某个知名矿业财团打算趁机攫取利益，正在干扰王朝殖民地的矿石运输工作。
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区危机期间，某个知名矿业财团打算趁机攫取利益，正在干扰王朝殖民地的矿石运输工作。

languages.text: En su intento de beneficiarse de la crisis de la Extensión, un importante consorcio minero está interrumpiendo los envíos de mineral a las colonias del protectorado.
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: En su intento de beneficiarse de la crisis de la Extensión, un importante consorcio minero está interrumpiendo los envíos de mineral a las colonias del protectorado.

languages.text: Ein großes Mining-Konsortium möchte die Krise in der Ausdehnung ausnutzen und hat die Erzlieferungen in die Kolonien des Protektorats eingestellt.
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Ein großes Mining-Konsortium möchte die Krise in der Ausdehnung ausnutzen und hat die Erzlieferungen in die Kolonien des Protektorats eingestellt.

languages.text: Enginlik'teki krizden yararlanma çabası içindeki önde gelen bir madencilik konsorsiyumu, protektora kolonilerine yapılan cevher sevkiyatlarını aksatıyor.
languages.original_text: In its efforts to exploit the crisis in the Expanse, a prominent mining consortium is disrupting ore shipments to the colonies of the protectorate.
